``` {r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(plotly)

Cats <- c('Zola', 'Mochi', 'Nyan', 'Nala', 'Grumpy')
Cuteness <- c(8.0, 7.5, 2.5, 9.5, 4.3)
Chubbiness <- c(11, 12, 0, 9, 13)
data <- data.frame(Cats, Cuteness, Chubbiness)

plot_ly(data, x = ~Cuteness, y = ~Chubbiness, type = 'scatter',
        mode = 'text', text = ~Cats, textposition = 'middle right',
        textfont = list(color = '#000000', size = 16)) %>%
  layout(title = 'Best Cats',
         xaxis = list(title = 'Cutness Level (stars)',
                      zeroline = TRUE,
                      range = c(0, 10)),
         yaxis = list(title = 'Chubbiness Level (lbs)',
                      range = c(0,15)))
```
